# NSHorizontalDirection

**Enumeration**

An absolute direction on the horizontal axis.

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen enum NSHorizontalDirection
```

## Structures

- **NSHorizontalDirection.Set**: An efficient set of horizontal directions.

## Enumeration Cases

- **NSHorizontalDirection.left**: The left direction.
- **NSHorizontalDirection.right**: The right direction.

## Type Methods

- **leading(relativeTo:)**: Returns the leading direction in the given user interface layout direction.
- **trailing(relativeTo:)**: Returns the trailing direction in the given user interface layout direction.

## Enumerations

- **NSCursor.FrameResizePosition**: The position along the perimeter of a rectangular frame (its edges and corners) from which it’s resized.
- **NSSharingCollaborationMode**: Represents the types of sharing (collaborating on an item vs. sending a copy of the item) The share picker supports up to two modes, each of which corresponds to one of these types
- **NSImage.DynamicRange**: Describes how High Dynamic Range (HDR) image content displays.
- **NSTextCursorAccessoryPlacement**
- **NSVerticalDirection**: A direction on the vertical axis.
- **NSWritingToolsBehavior**: Constants that specify the Writing Tools experience for the underlying view.
- **NSWritingToolsResultOptions**: Constants to specify what type of content to allow in Writing Tools suggestions or rewrites.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- CaseIterable
- Copyable
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
